name: Goldenhaven City
description: A prosperous trading city where merchant ships dock at busy harbors and exotic goods from distant lands fill the markets. Golden banners flutter from tall buildings built with wealth from maritime commerce.

center.name: Golden Square
center.description: The magnificent city center features a golden fountain surrounded by the finest shops and guildhalls. Wealthy merchants and nobles conduct business in the shadow of the Grand Exchange building.

buildings.name: Grand Exchange
buildings.description: The financial heart of the city where currencies are exchanged and large transactions occur.

buildings.name: Golden Bazaar
buildings.description: An upscale market selling rare and exotic goods from across the world.

buildings.name: Merchant Princes Guild
buildings.description: The most powerful guild in the city, controlling trade routes and merchant licenses.

west.name: Western Gate
west.description: The main entrance from the kingdom highway, fortified with impressive gates and guard towers. Merchant caravans line up for inspection before entering the city.

buildings.name: Customs House
buildings.description: Where all goods entering the city are inspected and taxed.

buildings.name: Caravan Rest Inn
buildings.description: A large inn designed to accommodate merchant caravans and their guards.

north.name: Mountain District
north.description: The northern district built against the foothills, where miners and mountain traders conduct business. The air is cleaner here and mountain springs provide fresh water.

buildings.name: Mountain Ore Exchange
buildings.description: A major trading post for ores, gems, and mining equipment.

east.name: Eastern Port
east.description: The bustling harbor district where ships from distant lands dock. The salty air carries the sounds of creaking rigging and merchant auctions.

buildings.name: Harbor Master's Office
buildings.description: Where ship passages are booked and cargo is registered.

buildings.name: The Salty Anchor
buildings.description: A rowdy tavern where sailors share tales of distant lands.
